subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pitcher Micah Owings hit a pinch-hit homer to tie the score in the sixth inning as the host Diamondbacks rallied from four runs behind to defeat the Astros on Wednesday.
snippet: Pitcher Micah Owings hit a pinch-hit homer to tie the score in the sixth inning as the host Diamondbacks rallied from four runs behind to defeat the Astros on Wednesday.
